price: Dájúdájú àwọn tó gbàgbọ́ ní òdodo, tí wọ́n ṣe àwọn iṣẹ́ rere, tí wọ́n sì dúnní mọ́ ìronúpìwàdà sọ́dọ̀ Olúwa wọn, àwọn wọ̀nyẹn ni èrò inú Ọgbà Ìdẹ̀ra. Olùṣegbére ni wọ́n nínú rẹ̀.
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ وَأَخۡبَتُوٓاْ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِمۡ أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ أَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلۡجَنَّةِۖ هُمۡ فِيهَا خَٰلِدُونَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: inna alladhīna āmanū waʿamilū al-ṣāliḥāti wa-akhbatū ilā rabbihim ulāika aṣḥābu al-janati hum fīhā khālidūna
